Name: Knights of Legends
About the game: 《Knights of Legends》 is a classic turn based strategic adventure game, which integrates role playing, strategic fighting, and urban construction. Players will experience different campaign scenario ,compete with other players,challenge the tower of pride . Come and build your own kingdom, recruit powerful troops, and experience the charm of the classic SRPG game! Game features: 1. A total of 31 heroes of the four races can be selected: each hero has its own skills, troop features, and unique battle style. 2. Each race has 7 levels of units, each unit can be upgraded to a higher level. 3. You can forge different equipments at your will. Some equipment has its own unique terms. The top-level equipment also has the set effect, which can play a role in battle. 4. There are 6 big maps, 36 campaigns, more than 300 battles, and different challenges. According to the player's operation, the strength of each battle opponent will change differently every day. Your choice determines the difficulty of the battle. 5. We also provide urban construction. You can summon heroes, forge equipments, research technology, recruit soldiers and buy market resources. 6. A variety of daily game modes: ranking in the arena, seizing resources, climbing towers, and real-time fights and guild war mode will come soon.
